title: Ye Hai Mohabbatein
cast: Divyanka Tripathi, Karan Patel, Ruhanika Dhawan
plot: The show follows the love story of Ishita Iyer, who is a Tamilian and Raman Bhalla, who is a Punjabi. Ishita is sterile and gets attached emotionally to Raman's daughter, Ruhi, who lives with her divorced father. Raman's ex-wife, Shagun Arora, lives with her boyfriend and Raman's ex-boss and business rival Ashok Khanna and Aditya(Adi), her and Raman's son. Bhallas and Iyers are neighbors. Due to circumstances, Raman and Ishita marry each other for Ruhi's custody and gradually fall in love with each other and lead a happy life.

title: Naamkarann
cast: Viraf Patel, Barkha Bisht, Puru Chibber, Pooja Verma
plot: Naamkarann is a story of an illegitimate child, Avni, who in a journey to create an identity for herself faces numerous hurdles created by her own grandmother, Dayavanti. In this journey, Avni realises that Dayavanti too is a victim of her past and learns to forgive her.

title: Ishqbaaaz
cast: Nakuul Mehta, Kunal Jaisingh, Leenesh Mattoo
plot: The series is said to be based on the lives of three brothers.

title: Pardes Mein Hai Mera Dil
cast: Drashti Dhami, Arjun Bijlani, Ashish Kaul
plot: Naina, a simple village girl, gets engaged to a rich and westernised man, Neel. However, she shares a deeper bond with Neel's foster brother.

title: Meri Durga
cast: Ananya Agarwal, Vicky Ahuja
plot: Durga, a young, fun loving girl from Haryana, lives with her father, Yashpal, who works as a school peon. He has big dreams for her and wants to her achieve huge success in her life.

title: Shakti — Astitva Ke Ehsaas Ki
cast: Rubina Dilaik, Vivian Dsena, Roshni Sahota
plot: Soumya and Surabhi are close-knit sisters. While one is discriminated against by her family and society, the other sister stands up for her through tough times.

title: Kasam
cast: Sharad Malhotra, Kratika Sengar
plot: After an incident where Tanushree saves Rishi, a female sadhu prophesises that they are a perfect match for each other. However, various ordeals take a toll on their relationship.

title: UDAAN
cast: Meera Deosthale, Varun Sharma, Paras Arora
plot: Udann is a mission to highlight the grave issue of bonded labour in Indian villages. Chakor is the name of the show’s protagonist. Her name is the symbol for the unrealised hopes of countless Indians, suppressed by this barbaric practice of bonded-labour.

title: Devanshi
cast: Helly Shah, Karuna Pandey, Ankita Sharma
plot: The show is set in Haryana. It focuses on issues related to superstition. The plot revolves around a child divinely selected as a dedication to the goddess. The mystery is that the innocence of the child outwits the wiles of adults around her. It has lessons for both children and adults and it is entertaining to watch.

title: Ek Shringaar-Swabhiman
cast: Ankitta Sharma, Sangeeta Chauhan, Prachi Shah
plot: Sharda, a single mother, goes through numerous hardships to give a good upbringing to her young daughters in a male-dominated society.

title: Crime Patrol
cast: Diwakar Pundir, Saakshi Tanwar, Shakti Anand
plot: Crime Patrol - Satark is a reality documentary aimed at crime prevention by recreating a dramatized version of real life cases. The basic idea behind the show is to make viewers alert and aware of possible danger and criminal activities prevailing in their neighborhood. The series, which was first aired in May 2003, shows the real picture of civilians and the alert Indian police which is unfortunately often misinterpreted. The show is hosted by noted TV actor Anoop Soni. The series, whose motto is 'Crime never pays', showcases some of the most brutal crimes in India's history including the 2012 Delhi Gang Rape case. Some shows may have content which may be disturbing for children, hence parental guidance is advised. The hard work of Indian police in solving real life cases is noteworthy. Keep watching Crime Patrol – Satark to know about the real incidents and stay alert!

title: Beyhadh
cast: Jennifer Winget, Kushal Tandon
plot: Beyhadh is a Romantic thriller showcasing two different shades of love one driven by obsession & the other by selflessness and purity. It is the story of Maya, Arjun and Saanjh.

title: Ek Rishta Saajhedari Ka
cast: Kinshuk Vaidya, Shivya Pathania, Surbhi Tiwari
plot: In our society it is believed that marriages are not only between two individuals but between the two families. The show explores the story of Aryan and Sanchi. Aryan and Sanchi are a young couple who meet each other at a wedding. They have an arranged marriage and fall in love with each other. Due to certain misunderstandings between the families their relationship comes under stress. Despite the hardships Aryan and Sanchi stand by each other and try to bring their fami

title: Peshwa Bajirao
cast: Manish Wadhwa, Anuja Sathe, Pallavi Joshi
plot: The series is based on Maratha Peshwa Bajirao I, who ruled under Chhatrapati Shahu.

title: Kuch Rang Pyar Ke Aise Bhi
cast: Shaheer Sheikh, Erica Fernandes, Supriya Pilgaonkar
plot: The show explores work in progress relationship of Dev and Sonakshi. Dev is a successful business tycoon who lives with his mother Ishwari and three sisters. Dev was only eight years old when he lost his father. His mother Ishwari had to make a lot of sacrifices for the upbringing of her children. Dev owes everything to his mother and has a feeling of indebtedness and complete devotion for her.

title: Savdhaan India
cast: Sushant Singh Gaurav Chopra
plot: A show that focuses on India’s fight for justice against shocking real-life crime cases which will thrill you with an underlying message that this might happen to you and hence you should be aware of your surroundings. Watch real-life stories of real-life heroes who did not succumb to crime in Savdhaan India - India Fights Back

title: Har Mard Ka Dard
cast: Faisal Rashid, Vaishali Thakkar, Parmeet Sethi
plot: Har Mard Ka Dard showcases how men are groomed from a very young age to eventually serve as a pendulum between their wife and mother post marriage.

title: Ghulaam
cast: Param Singh, Niti Taylor, Vikas Manaktala
plot: Take a look at the past episodes of 'Ghulaam', the story of an ancient land where women are treated like prisoners.

title: Sanyukt
cast: Shubhangi Latkar, Kiran Kumar, Harsh Vashisht, Maninder Singh
plot: The story of the show is about an extended family and the trials and tribulations between each family member.

title: Kumkum Bhagya
cast: Sriti Jha, Shabbir Ahluwalia, Vin Rana
plot: Sarla Arora, who runs a marriage hall, hopes to see her two daughters, Pragya and Bulbul, happily married.

title: Kaala Teeka
cast: Sukirti Kandpal, Simran Pareenja, Karan Sharma
plot: As part of a superstitious act, Kaali is expected to follow Gauri everywhere she goes in order to keep her away from all harm, which creates a lot of obstacles for the former.
